events.title: Only in Dubai. Arranging the biggest shopping festival.

reviews.name: Zoya Zam
reviews.comment: Oh, how i love Dubai. The shopping festival was amazing and I got so many amazing things at half the price.

reviews.name: Scarlett Johanson
reviews.comment: This was amazing. Everything was so well organized. Shopping in comfort, what more do you want.

reviews.name: Marlyn Manrow
reviews.comment: I got everything I wanted for half the price.
